title: THIS is your childhood my fellow league players, this is your childhood..

replies.body: Can't tell if that makes it really sad or really awesome

Bit of both really, the heavier content, such as Carlton getting the gun or Will's dad skipping out on him again, really hit me in the feels, you know? But it's also awesome because it hit on both the funny things that made it a comedy and the heavy things to keep it grounded a bit.

> [{quoted}](name=Cpt Azrael,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=IiQeyGEJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-03T11:43:41.587+0000)
>
> Nope, this is mine.
> https://media4.giphy.com/media/nuzQxFyKAVoRi/200.gif

Jump on it!
Technically, that was before my childhood, but I do remember that song.
I meant the show :P I just chose this particular gif cause it caught my eye first
